main event: A bright light shaped like a cigar, the size of a gallon can, hovered above tree level and quickly disappeared.
interesting points: The object made no noise but seemed to hover.
The object was bluish-green in color and had a very bright, silvery sheen.
When the object disappeared, it left a trail of reddish sparks.
The witness, a reliable observer, was a commercial stocker and feeder, as well as a commercial vegetable grower.
The preparing officer considered the witness to be an intelligent and reliable source.
